key_talking_points: Matthew Tkachuk of the Florida Panthers misses a shot early in the first period. The Panthers lead the Oilers 5-4 with 18:54 remaining in the first. The game has been high scoring so far.
for_commentary_agent.context: The game is close in the first period. Although the momentum score is low, the missed shot combined with the close score warrants MIXED_COVERAGE to provide context.

high_intensity_events.summary: M. Tkachuk (FLA) missed a snap shot from behind the net near the right-wing boards.

task_details.specific_guidance: Briefly mention the missed shot, then transition to discussing the high-scoring nature of the game thus far or potential goalie adjustments that might be made.
